entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
